item.description:
On Saturdays in May we will be holding outdoor volleyball QK doubles series. These are friendship tournament event meetups that are reverse coed doubles matches played in a King-Queen format, meaning that you will be playing with and against different people during pool play. Top players after pool play will compete in a playoff format.

This is a friendship tournament format, meaning call your own faults, as there are no referees.

Organizers for this event series will be Brian Lee and Matt BenDaniel.

We will be using the ruleset listed in the first post on the following URL: http://volleyball.mee...

The events will start at 9 AM and will likely last at least until the early afternoon (~2 PM). If you would like to play in this event you must commit to staying at least through the end of pool play. Remember to bring snacks/food and water/beverages, as this event will involve a significant amount of volleyball play.

This event is intended for players with experience playing reverse coed doubles format. Signup for these events is a little different. To sign up for one or more of these events, please send me an email using the following link on meetup: http://volleyball.mee...

In the email, provide the following information:

Name
Gender
Event date(s) that you would like to sign up for
Email address
Cell phone number
Outdoor rating (AA/A/BB/B), if you have one; otherwise, short description of reverse coed doubles experience
Confirm that you have read the ruleset at the link above and that you agree to play by those rules.
Confirm that you can commit to play from 9 AM to 2 PM.
Signup partner name (if you have a signup partner)

Preferably, each player in a signup pair should send an email.

For this event we will have a strict cap of 16 players (8 men, 8 women) to simplify the event management. Preference is given to AA/A/BB players who sign up in male/female pairs, although some single signups will be allowed. Note that sending an email does not guarantee a spot to play; spots are only guaranteed if you are assigned a Yes RSVP.
item.name: Advanced Outdoor (Sand) QK RevCoed Doubles Volleyball
